Search form

Business Account Application

Please Note Effective March 15, 2023: You agree, in order for us to service your account or to collect any amounts you may owe, we may contact you by telephone at any telephone number associated with your account, including wireless telephone numbers, which could result in charges to you. We may also contact you by sending text messages or emails, using any email address you provide us. Methods of contact may include using pre-recorded or artificial voice messages and/or the use of an automatic dialing device, as applicable. 

  • I/We have read this disclosure and agree that City of Corinth may contact me/us as described above.
  • All bills for service rendered are due when issued. If the bill is paid after the due date indicated, a late charge will be assessed. Bills not paid in full by the final due date of the month will be charged a $50 service fee and will be subject to disconnection.
  • All accounts are required, by City Ordinance, to have a deposit on file, no exceptions.
  • New residents are able to pay the deposit at the Utility Billing Department at City Hall using a Visa, MasterCard, or Discover. A utility billing staff member will call the number provided within 1 business day to process.
  • New account start dates are available during normal business hours which are Monday - Thursday 7:30 a.m. - 5 p.m. and Friday 7:30 a.m. - 11 a.m. Please submit application no less than 24 hours prior to start date.

 

Service Request

Start Date
Deposit
Monthly Billing *
CHOOSE YOUR BILLING PREFERENCE Ebills - With electronic billing, your bills are emailed to you monthly! No more worrying about it being lost in the mail, sitting on a pile on the counter or inadvertently being tossed with the junk mail. (This option is not the same as bank drafting your payment each month.) Paper - Receive your bills monthly in the mail.
Service Agreement *
Permission

I understand that the City will begin water service by making a physical connection located at the meter outside the building or buildings to be served. I understand that the City will not have access to any building served and will not determine if there are any open faucets or water system leaks inside the building. I understand that I am responsible for services provided by the City as charged on my monthly bill. I understand that I am responsible for late fees, reconnect fees, and any charges incurred in accordance with City Ordinance(s). I understand and agree to abide by the service agreement provided by the utility billing department.

Receive an email copy of this form.
